name: FORSAKEn iSLE (itch)
description: Welcome to Forsaken Isle, the next generation of 3D Survival Games. You are a PTSD War veteran who is trapped in a time-loop of nightmares where you wake up to find yourself stranded on an isle, where you must scavenge and fight off blood-thirsty enemies and perilous creatures. Your objective is to survive as long as, whether that be through killing all enemies which appear before you, or eating fruits to satiate your hunger, so as to not starve to death. Good luck and live, die, repeat!
